alert.note: Alert for Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 2:21PM EDT until July 17 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 221 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near St. Marks, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Woodville, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Wakulla, Shadeville, Shell Point, Port Leon, Wakulla Beach, Hyde Park and Liveoak Island. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
